reviews.comments: The flat is more older that you can think with the pictures, but it is very cool. The kitchen is great and the bed are good. Kreuzberg is a very great place, also with children. Alex is very nice, but we didn't meet him.

It was very nice and clean. The neighborhood is near of supermarkets, coffees, stores, you can find everything. There a subway station walking distance that connect us with all the attractions in Berlin. Just was a problem with the toilette.
Alex was very helpful and the apartment was in a great location
We had a fantastic stay at Alex's apartment. The location is fantastic and the apartment was spacious. lovely bathroom and kitchen facilities also. would highly recommend.

Had a really time in Alex's flat, the neighbourhood in which it is located is really nice and allows to reach many important Ubahn stations.
The flat is really good for the price it costs.
Great flat!
Perfect location, cool building, spacious living! Thanks Alex!
Everything was perfect! Thanks for all

Alex was very flexible and always ready to answer our questions on Airbnb chat. 

Flat is like described but the best thing is its location. We really enjoyed it, going for coffee, beer and dinner around the flat.
The apartment is in a nice part of town and I enjoyed my stay here. For the price we paid it was great. Alex was a really nice guy and made us feel welcome.

Alex was very flexible and made sure we could find the apartment, although we had a late check-in. He was very communicative and we could reach him when necessary. The apartment was very clean and tidy, the kitchen was well-equipped and the rooms were cosy. We loved our stay here, as well as the lively neighbourhood. Definitely recommended!

The apartment is very nice as you see it in the picture. We lived an original "Kreuzberg" experience as there are some bars around. 

If you like the underground vibes of Berlin then this apartment is very good choice.

Alex was very friendly and helpful and the listing description was accurate, but this was not the best area of Kreuzberg - I would actually recommend somewhere near the Kotbusser Tor stop, which was a 20 min walk away.

Other cons: I would also not describe the apartment as "cozy" - the red bedroom was quite unnerving to sleep in, the walls were super thin so I could hear the person in the next apartment coughing every night, there was a spider in the bathroom, no hooks to hang towels, a light bulb burnt out and broken in the socket, and the sheets had been washed but still looked stained and dirty :-(  

Pros: But the wifi was fast and Alex was always very prompt with communication! I think if you are a big group of people on a small budget this would be a good place, as it would be so cheap. But if you are just one or two people I would not recommend it, you could find something better, in a better part of Kreuzberg, for the same price.

We did not get to meet Alex, but the room was great. It was just as described and in a great area. The only issue we had was that our sink clogged but Alex was quick to response even though he wasnt in town that day to fix it. Overall it was a great apartment with perfect location to explore Berlin.

Unfortunately we didn't get to meet Alex, but he communicated well, making it easy for my roommates and I to get ahold of the keys and get into the flat. The flat is just as the pictures show and having a shared kitchen isn't a problem at all - it's fun to meet other travelers in Berlin!

Alex has a great place in Kreuzberg. I recommend it to everyone who is planning a citytrip to Berlin. The public transportation is close and there are a lot of shops and restaurants nearby. Kreuzberg is one of our favorite neighborhoods, so the location was perfect. The arrangement for the key-transfer works perfectly. Alex was very thoughtful and easy to reach during our stay. Sharing the kitchen was no problem, there is more than enough privacy. Because there are so many shops and restaurants around te corner, we actually did not use the kitchen that much. We were with 5 girls, so we used all the beds and they were all very comfortable. The room was really cosy, from the moment we came in it felt like our home for the weekend. I would like to thank Alex again for the apartment and his hospitality. When we come back to Berlin we will definitely think of this place again.

It was a very nice and cozy apartment. The location was perfect, close to public transport and a lot of restaurants and other shops. The key construction was a good one and the communication with Alex was very easy. Thank you for a lovely stay Alex!

Great private room in Kreuzberg, near the metro station Mehringdamm. The kitchen is shared with someone else as it's written. Sometimes, the neighbours were a little bit noisy (some of them played guitar at midnight once). But the private room is clean and very charming. And we enjoyed it because it was an old gay bar (you can see that in the entry). Thank you Alex!
Great space, very clean and in the centre of plenty to do.

Everything went smoothly, Alex was always very fast with responding. Picking up key was a bit confusing for me, but it is not that big of a deal. Neighbourhood is good, metro is walking distance away and with it you are everywhere in Berlin in short time, and around corner you have  beautiful Bergmannstrasse wih lot of cafes, shops and restaurants. Don't miss on Barcomi's, great sweets and coffee.
Very nice flat and Alex is always available to answer some questions. Very good location , Thanks for these days Alex !
This appartment is perfect for a Berlin experience. It's cosy and has a great location!
very nice apartment. in a very convenient location near the metro and lots of shops. we liked!!! Thank you

Nice and practical apartment, very close to several metro stations and to many nice shops and restaurants. If you're willing to walk a bit, the rest of the city is also within a walkable distance. Alex sent us instructions to get the keys and everything went as planned. I recommand this place.

It was so easy everything, from receiving the keys, to parking the car. We met Alex and he was so nice and kind. The apartment was perfect for us four girls and the shared kitchen was no problem at all.

We did not meet the host. But the key pick up was well organized,no  problem.  The area in former East Berlin is ok, quite central and With good U-Bahn Connections. Some exotic bars in the neighbourhood. The flat is on the 5th floor without lift. You need to be in good shape! Facilities are very sparesome, but ok if Your intention is only to sleep there.

Alex's place was lovely and warm (a relief considering the winter weather!) and very clean and comfortable. The best part is the location, the apartment is so close to Mehringdamm U-bahn so it's incredibly easy to get everywhere. Definitely worth a stay here, it's incredible valine for money.

Staying at Alex's Apartement was an over-all good experience. Its located in a good spot - close to metro station & market where someone can find all essential food/breakfast/bars etc. the communication with Alex was also easy-going with no problems or misunderstundings! The house is in a good size, condition & has got all essentials in it! Thank you Alex !!

We had a great stay in Alex's apartment. He gave us very clear directions on how to access the place and was very friendly and efficient in his communication. The apartment was very comfortable and in a great location.  I would mention that it is listed under entire home/apt, which is mostly accurate but a little misleading. There is another room attached that someone else lives in  and the kitchen and bathroom are communal. This was not an issue at all for us but we didn't expect it. Great experience overall - I would definitely recommend it!
I didn't get the chance to met Alex, but the house is really great! i recommend for everyone and also great great location and many things you have in the zone! :)

We had to pick the keys ourselves, which was a bit uncomfortable and impractical (bad weather didn't help). It was a surprise to have a roomate (we missed it in the description) and the doorbell didn't work. The place was very similar to pictures, with a big living room and kitchen. There was no hot water in the kitchen and the doorknob of the bathroom door was hard to handle with.

All beds were prepared and clean, there was some basic stuff for cooking and all cleaning products needed to maintain the space.

The area is great, full of restaurants and bars and shops, good connections with Ubahn & Sbahn. A bit noisiy during the night (might be a problem during summer if you need to open windows).
The host is very friendly and solved some problems for me during the trip in Berlin. Therefore, I really recommend others to book this apartment.
Alex was very good with communication and we were easily able to find the place and check in. Apartment was nice and spacious enough for us all.

We were five people staying in this apartment for four nights. We didn't meet the host personally but he answered all our questions very fast and gave clear instructions about picking up the key etc. The apartment was cozy and spacious and nicely located (near the metro and on a cool area of Berlin). The apartment wasn't super tidy but wasn't unclean either, everything was alright for us. The pillows were quite uncomfortable and some of us had quite a sore neck in the mornings. The kitchen was very good and there was a separate fridge for us to use, which was great as well. All in all a good choice to stay in Berlin: nice location, spacious and reasonable price for five people.

A convenient placed flat in a lively neighborhood with many restaurants etc. The flat is OK but has a somwhat dated second rate makeover year old makeover, so it's perfect if you're into a refto mood, and works totally if you plan to be oput and about most of the time. Minimal personal touches save the day and gives 4 stars.

It fits the decription and pictures, so there's nothing to complain about.

Kreuzberg was a very nice and interesting neighbourhood. A lot of places to go out for a eat or a drink. We enjoyed walking around there and looking at things. 
The apartment looked a little more glamorous on the photos but it was clean so that was not a problem.
I did not see the small letters that say that the kitchen is shared with another apartment. I specifically searched for an apartment where we would have to whole place to ourselves. 
The plan was to stay in and cook during evenings but we were not very excited about being in someone's kitchen. The other apartment is also rented for long term(not travellers) so we kind of felt like intruding someone's home by using the kitchen.
But the couple in the other apartment were very nice and said that we could use the kitchen as we liked, we just did not feel very comfortable with it. 
The kitchen was not very well equipped, only two cereal bowls(we were four persons) and so on.
We never met Alex but when two of us reached out to him to stay for one more night he provided an apartment and answered very quickly which was great.

The house and the neighbourhood vibe were amazing. Everything looks just like the pictures and the house have this amazing charm that brings the experience to a more Berliner level. I will definitely stay here next time I am going to Berlin.

Bit of confusion over the collection of keys to this place, but Alex did his utmost to sort it all out, leaving work early and driving me around to collect them. Had a very pleasant convo during the drive, so didn't feel too peeved about the key situation... pretty sure it was the first time that had happened to him. Bless. 

Flat was really nice, good space to hang out, lots of good food shops etc... on the street just outside and a DISCO BALL right outside the front door which makes the alleyway where it's located, way less intimidating than it could be. Lovely.

Alexs flat is beautiful and well situated right in the middle of Kreuzburg and very close by U Bahn to nearby attraction Templehoft air field is just up the road and we enjoyed a sun drenched after noon there playing Mini golf :) the flat is warm and spacious we had everything we needed the flat is above a number of shops and clubs however the double glazing is excellent and so it is quiet and peaceful inside. The shower has great pressure and the kitchen is kitted out with all the mod cons just a small point the flat is on the fourth floor and there is no lift so if someone had mobility issues this may not be the best place to choose however we had a great time great value brilliant Location

Alex was always really quick in responding. We had an issue with the door to the apartment when there and he came out to check that day although nothing could be done straightaway. Like previous reviews have said the apartment was shabbier than expected, lots of dust around too. It was in a great area and a good price. It wasn't very comfy though. My friend needed to put one quilt over the mattress so she wouldn't feel the springs. The dining room chairs had springs coming through. And the sofa was not suitable for relaxing on. There was no wardrobe or drawers so had to have clothes in suitcase or hanging over chairs or on the coat stand. It was great having the two separate bedrooms though. No TV or radio so not great for hanging out. Good having the use of the kitchen although the two apartments are separated very amateurish - the door to our apartment did not fit the makeshift surround. It's a good space, it wouldn't take much for it to be comfier.

My 3 friends and I had a great time at Alex's apartment. Although we didn't get the chance to meet, Alex made us feel really welcome and his communication was always clear and speedy. Lovely flat, awesome location, great price!

(Both in English and German) The apartment did not hold up to the expectations based on the pictures. It's a lot shabbier in reality. The apartment was rather filthy, there was hair in one bed, the bed sheets had stains on them and the toilet was dirty. The freezing compartment in the fridge in the living room leaked a milk-like substance that we had to keep mopping up, and it smelled rather badly. We obviously can't tell if that is the host's or the previous guest's fault, but the host could have fixed that before someone else rented the apartment (and he could have cleaned it, as well). The shower head in the bathroom was not attachable, so you had to hold it in your hand while showering. The bathroom doesn't have a towel rail or hook. The light in the small bedroom only works when the light is on in the living room at the same time, which is annoying when one person wants to sleep and another still wants to read or do something else. Recently a new door was installed where you can still see the remnants of the construction such as styrofoam and some debris. Which isn't too much of a nuisance, but it gives the place an uncomfortable feel to it. And of course it is hidden well in the pictures. We did not meet the host personally. Not too bothersome, but a little impersonal. Altogether the apartment makes a shabby and rather filthy impression, and for that price there are certainly better apartments available in Berlin. Das Appartement entsprach leider nicht den Erwartungen, die man anhand der Bilder vorher hatte. Es sieht in echt deutlich schäbiger aus. Die Hygiene ließ zu wünschen übrig. Es waren Haare im Bett aufzufinden, der Bettbezug war fleckig und das Klo schmutzig. Aus dem Kühlschrank im Wohnzimmer lief eine merkwürdige milchige Flüssigkeit aus dem Eisfach, welche unangenehm roch und wir immer wieder aufwischen mussten. Ob hierfür der Gastgeber oder der Vermieter verantwortlich war, ist natürlich nicht auszumachen, jedoch hätte der dieses Ärgernis vorher beheben können. Der Duschkopf im Bad war nicht anbringbar, somit musste man beim Duschen stets mit einer Hand den Duschkopf halten. Das Bad hat keinen Haken oder eine Halterung für Handtücher. Das Licht im kleinen Schlafzimmer funktioniert nur, wenn im Wohnzimmer gleichzeitig das Licht an ist. Nervig, wenn eine Person bereits schlafen, jemand anders jedoch noch lesen oder etwas anderes im Nebenraum tun möchte. Kürzlich wurde eine neue Tür zum Wohnzimmer eingebaut, vorher war dort eine deutlich größere, die Umrisse sind davon noch zu sehen und Schaumstoff, Styropor und Schuttreste sind noch am Türrahmen. An sich nicht sonderlich schlimm, jedoch macht es die Wohnung gleich auf den ersten Eindruck etwas ungemütlich. Und auf den Bildern wird das natürlich geschickt versteckt. Den Gastgeber trafen wir nicht persönlich. Nicht...
We had a great time at Alex's, the apartment was perfect for our group, clean and very well located
The flat is very big and perfect for a group of five-six people. Alex is a very reliable host and we enjoyed our stay in Berlin!

The apartment was very spacious. There were four of us and it was a perfect amount of space. Everything was clean and taken care of. The area was great-- there were plenty of restaurants and stores to choose from. The closest underground is a 5-10 minute walk away, which can get you to the Berlin Wall in around 15 minutes. Thanks for everything!
A large apartment that with a good location that near the U bahn and the renowned shop curry 36! Even we cannot meet Alex, he still everything we need!

Our experience at Alex's apt was great. The apt is very well located - subway is just 5 minutes walk and lots of nice bars in the sorroundings. The apt is very well confortable, no problem at all with sharing kitchen. 
Alex has been an excellent host from the beginning. Even if he couldn't meet us, he managed to make it possible for us to get the keys. Also, he let us to store our luggage until the afternoon. 
Hope to stay again at his place in my next trip to Berlin :)
Convenient location, lots of restaurants and pubs nearby, and the flat is clean and tidy.
A really nice and large flat in a good location.
Very convenient location, and helpful host.
